Negar Maleki received his bachelor's and master's degree in Industrial Engineering in 2018 and 2020. Currently, She is a Ph.D. student in Big Data Analysis at Muma College of Business at the University of South Florida. She is passionate about data-driven decision-making and real-world problem solving using Big Data tools, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Data Analysis.
